#summary Show the URI of the last selected entity

= URI Tools =

== Description ==

Entity URI just shows the URI of the last selected entity

== Screenshot ==

<img src="http://www.co-ode.org/downloads/protege-x/plugins/images/entity-uri-view.png" />

== Find the plugin ==

Entity URI is a view plugin. Find it under the *View | Misc views | Entity URI* menu
